title: Ratzinger Intro #7 Chap 2 a. The Apostle's Creed: Born in Dialog, Shaped by Faith, Pressed by Power
description:
In chapter 2, we begin a discussion of the formation of that symbol of the Christian faith known as the Apostles' Creed, from its start as a simple dialogic baptismal confession to the complete textual form we know today -- a process that took most of the first millenium.

How to pronounce my last name: The "c" is silent just to confuse people.
